          <title>
            <string language="en">Lesson 2, Target letter: a . Nans Nap</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion 2, Zielzeichen: a. Nans Haar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon 2, lettre de cible : a. Petit 
somme de Nans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição 2, letra do alvo: a. Sesta De
Nans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione 2, lettera dell'obiettivo: a. 
Pelo Di Nans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα 2, επιστολή στόχων: α. NAP 
Nans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lección 2, carta de la blanco: a. 
Siesta De Nans</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson materials related to the letter "a". Includes reading pratice exercies and a matching game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionmaterialien standen auf dem Zeichen "a" in
Verbindung. Schließt Messwertpratice exercies und ein 
zusammenpassendes Spiel ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les matériaux de leçon ont associé à la 
lettre "a". Inclut des exercies de pratice de lecture et un jeu 
assorti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os materiais da lição relacionaram-se à letra 
"a". Inclui exercies do pratice da leitura e um jogo combinando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali di lezione relativi alla lettera "a". 
Include i exercies di pratice della lettura e un gioco di 
corrispondenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικά μαθήματος σχετικά με το γράμμα "α". 
Περιλαμβάνει τα exercies pratice ανάγνωσης και ένα 
ταιριάζοντας με παιχνίδι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los materiales de la lección se relacionaron con
la carta "a". Incluye exercies del pratice de la lectura y un 
juego que corresponde con.</string>
          </description>
